greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Inverse binomial transform of A001651.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-2).
formula: G.f.: x+1/Q(0) where Q(k) = 1 + x*(k+1)/(1 - 1/(1 - (k+1)/Q(k+1))); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Sep 23 2012
G.f.: 1+x/U(0) where U(k) = 1 - x*(k+4) + x*(k+3)/U(k+1); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Oct 11 2012
a(n) = A122803(n-2) for n >= 2. - _Georg Fischer_, Nov 03 2018
results.author: _Paul Curtz_, Aug 12 2008
ext: Edited and extended by _R. J. Mathar_, Aug 28 2008
